project_path.UnityMetaToken: contracts/UnityMetaToken Full Smart Contract Security Audit/UnityMetaToken

findings.title: Out of gas
findings.description: The functions bulkIsBlacklisted() and bulkupdateAllowedTransfer() use loops that can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the addresses list is too long.
findings.location: UnityMetaToken contract, functions bulkIsBlacklisted() and bulkupdateAllowedTransfer()
